title: Should we use Kotlin or Java to build a new Android app in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, As per my view if you want to develop an Android app in 2019 then you should go for Kotlin. Kotlin is developers most favourite framework now a days and it has many useful features compared to Java. Here you can look out my similar answer here: Steven Parker's answer to What should we learn KOTLIN or Java for Android development? If you want to know more why you should go for Kotlin, Simply follow my another answer on Kotlin vs Java for android app development. Here is another one: Steven Parker's answer to Which programming language should I learn, Java or Kotlin? Helpful? Sounds better! Have a happy learning.

Both are great for app development. If you already know java, then start with Kotlin. It is easy to understand and short code length. I just stared making app in Kotlin. According to my experience it is great. If you don’t know java, first learn with Java then move to Kotlin. You can also start Kotlin side by side. All the best. Have a HAPPY coding
